plot: A recently widowed Indian mother arrives from India to stay with her yuppy son in Canada. The drama pursues and questions race, love and relationships.
title: Betting on Love
plot_es: A recently widowed Indian mother arrives from India to stay with her yuppy son in Canada. The drama pursues and questions race, love and relationships.

produce.name: Bits and Pieces Picture Company Inc.
